text: 4.2: 1 Ko 12.3; 1 Zo 5.1Nde Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar gangip, ana hiarga, ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Nde mbarararga khaŋ nzuai guma, “Zisas Krais, ana guigira kha nuianan zergap, guma guara gegi.” Maaŋ nzuai guma, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar mba guman vhen ki. 4.2 Zon kha gava khergi tugen, Fhe Bakɨmen kamthoon gumgir wari ga shɨkshɨgi gumgi mbari, mbe fhura guiguigiap Zisas Kraisan tɨvir gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuav rui. Nza mba gumgi nzua rui buni, nza tuituigia nta kaŋgi fhuvara. Mba bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Mbe khaŋ muuŋgia mba gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Zisas gu Krais, mani wanira fara muuŋgi fhuvara.” Mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Krais, ana fhum fhum guarara, Fhe Bakɨme han ki kameŋ ma.” Ndu Zon 1.1 ganɨri. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma. Khueŋ guigi guarara, Krais, ana guma guara gegi. Fhe Bakɨme taagip kha gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav mba ŋaara muuŋgi. Ana Krais farver mba ŋaara muuŋgi. Kha guma Zisas, ana haa nuianan kav mba bigi ga muuŋgiap, ana zumgum rimgi. Ana vhɨra taagia kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ndi ŋaarar kurigi fhuvara. Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, Zon maaŋ muuŋgiap khaŋ nzuai, “Mba Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgir wari ga shɨshɨgi gumgi nzuai buni, nta guigira buni guari fhuvara. Zisas Krais ana Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma. Ana guma guara gegi. Ana muuŋgi ŋaar, ana ŋaara bavira muuŋgi.”
